Destructuring
slides.content:
# Destructuring ğŸ“¦

Extract values from arrays or properties from objects into distinct variables.

## Arrays
```javascript
const [a, b] = [10, 20];
console.log(a); // 10
```

## Objects
```javascript
const person = { name: "John", age: 30 };
const { name, age } = person;
console.log(name); // "John"
```
